revised_title: A Reevaluation of Balanoglossus Larva Development in the Bahamas
tldr: The author reevaluates the development of Balanoglossus larva found in the Bahamas and withdraws a previous statement about degeneration, acknowledging that the larvae belong to the normal order of development. The author expresses gratitude to Dr. Spengel for his assistance and kindness in this matter.
